featured.text: Bindis are worn anywhere on the face now.

definition.zh_def: 在印度文化中，通常是女性額頭上貼的裝飾性點，象徵著美麗和婚姻。
definition.en_def: A decorative mark worn on the forehead, typically by women in Indian culture, symbolizing beauty and marriage.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful bindi that complemented her traditional outfit.
